[DQR.IFRS.0103.9549] The element ifrs-full:PercentageOfVotingEquityInterestsAcquired with a value of 20 has a value greater than a 1,000 percent. Percentage items should have a value that are generally between 0 and 1. In XBRL a value of 1 is equal to 100%. Please review the value of the element to ensure that it is scaled correctly. For example 200 basis points should be reported as 0.02.
Period :2020-02-29 Dimensions : Unit : pure Decimals: 0
Rule Element Id:9549 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/5493008SR6XZECH6BN71/2021-12-31/ESEF/BE/0/bekb-2021-12-31-nl.zip/bekb-2021-12-31-nl/reports/bekb-2021-12-31-nl.xhtml 3499

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 1003004 - Statement - Overzicht van de financiële positie, vlottend/vast of kortlopend/langlopend (Statement - Activa) includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:NoncurrentAssets of 1,972,189,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 1,972,190,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of 3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:NoncurrentAssets that should add to 1,972,189,000 are comprised of the following:
+ DeferredTaxAssets 119,599,000 + Goodwill 150,674,000 + IntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill 61,440,000 + InvestmentAccountedForUsingEquityMethod 188,661,000 + OtherNoncurrentAssets 65,886,000 + PropertyPlantAndEquipment 1,253,857,000 + RightofuseAssetsThatDoNotMeetDefinitionOfInvestmentProperty 132,073,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 1003004 - Statement - Overzicht van de financiële positie, vlottend/vast of kortlopend/langlopend (Statement - Activa). If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:NoncurrentAssets Total Value : 1,972,189,000 Total period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : 3 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/5493008SR6XZECH6BN71/2021-12-31/ESEF/BE/0/bekb-2021-12-31-nl.zip/bekb-2021-12-31-nl/reports/bekb-2021-12-31-nl.xhtml 3499

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 1004005 - Statement - Overzicht van de financiële positie, vlottend/vast of kortlopend/langlopend (Statement - Passiva) includes an inconsistent calculation. The sum of these child components is 1,107,374,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of 3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. + DeferredTaxLiabilities 51,979,000 + LongtermBorrowings 953,581,000 + NoncurrentProvisionsForEmployeeBenefits 77,659,000 + OtherLongtermProvisions 23,311,000 + OtherNoncurrentLiabilities 844,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 1004005 - Statement - Overzicht van de financiële positie, vlottend/vast of kortlopend/langlopend (Statement - Passiva). [DQR.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of 1,614,781,000 reported in the network role http://www.bekaert.com/role/OverzichtvandefinancilepositievlottendvastofkortlopendlanglopendStatementPassiva should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 1,614,780,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.bekaert.com/role/MutatieoverzichtvanheteigenvermogenStatement. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of RetainedEarnings : 3 Decimals of Equity : 3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/5493008SR6XZECH6BN71/2021-12-31/ESEF/BE/0/bekb-2021-12-31-nl.zip/bekb-2021-12-31-nl/reports/bekb-2021-12-31-nl.xhtml 3499
